articles.author: Sam Shead
articles.title: Ford to spend $315 million converting British factory into electric vehicle plant - CNBC
articles.description: Ford has said it intends to spend $315 million transforming a factory in northwest England into an electric power unit production plant.
articles.content:
LONDON Ford announced Monday that it intends to spend £230 million ($315 million) transforming a factory in northwest England into a site that will make components for electric vehicles.
